lead_paragraph: The No. 8 Spartans lost on the road to the 18th-ranked Boilermakers, and sixth-ranked Kansas prevailed at home against No. 10 West Virginia.

headline.print_headline: Michigan Falls at Purdue; Kansas Tops West Virginia
headline.main: Michigan State Falls at Purdue; Kansas Tops West Virginia

snippet: The No. 8 Spartans lost on the road to the 18th-ranked Boilermakers, and sixth-ranked Kansas prevailed at home against No. 10 West Virginia.
abstract: Men's Roundup; Purdue beats Michigan in overtime, 82-81; other college basketball scores noted.
